<center>
<p>
  <table style="width:73%">
    <tr>
      <th> </th>
      <th> </th>
    </tr>
    <tr valign="top">
      <td>
        <font color="#18BC9C"><i>What?</i></font> &nbsp; &nbsp;
      </td>
      <td>
        One Friday each month, we will host an online seminar series with three short presentations (15 minutes each)—followed by a happy (half) hour! <br><br> 
        Papers and videos **will not** be circulated. <br><br>
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr valign="top">
      <td>
        <font color="#18BC9C"><i>Who?</i></font> &nbsp; &nbsp;
      </td>
      <td>
        For presenters, we're targeting graduate students, postdocs, and early-career assistant professors.<br>We may adjust selection based upon supply. <br><br> 
        There will be no discussants, but we will provide a time for questions after each paper. We will try and cluster papers by topic. <br><br>
        The organizers of **AERE\@OSWEET** include <a href="https://www.auffhammer.com/" style="text-decoration:none">Max Auffhammer</a> (UC Berkeley); <a href="https://dyson.cornell.edu/faculty-research/faculty/ao332/" style="text-decoration:none">Ariel Ortiz-Bobea</a> (Cornell); <a href="htts://edrub.in" style="text-decoration:none">Ed Rubin</a> (Oregon); <a href="https://www.krhwagner.com/" style="text-decoration: none">Katherine Wagner</a> (UBC). <br><br>
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr valign="top">
      <td>
        <font color="#18BC9C"><i>When?</i></font> &nbsp; &nbsp;
      </td>
      <td>
         Friday; see schedule below. <br><br>
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr valign="top">
      <td>
        <font color="#18BC9C"><i>Where?</i></font> &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;
      </td>
      <td>
        Zoom. We will send out a Zoom link to presenters and audience members. <br> [Register to receive emails here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdgzM-ELbZltycbJHmtZi3pG_gl0k6_8Q2ndOUOxh6dX13xsQ/viewform). <br><br>
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr valign="top">
      <td>
        <font color="#18BC9C"><i>More?</i></font> &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;
      </td>
      <td>
        This workshop is a supportive and constructive environment to present research (but you still have to bring your own beer/coffee/snacks to happy hour). <br><br>
      </td>
    </tr>
  </table>
</p>
</center>

**Interested?** [Please join the mailing list and/or apply to present!](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdgzM-ELbZltycbJHmtZi3pG_gl0k6_8Q2ndOUOxh6dX13xsQ/viewform) (And tell your friends.)
